title: Just a few Skin ideas for 2017.
body:
I know the amount of ideas is almost limitless but I think these skins would be cool.

Plus they fit into other themes and maybe open up options for some new ones on top; or even just could be new themes themselves.

Pool Party Vel'Koz: Well, he could be a giant Jellyfish. I mean he technically already is a jellyfish but maybe he could have a water spout as his ultimate or it could be a bit of a darker theme and be him inking people although that's a bit dirty.

Military Jinx: Same as regular Jinx but with maybe more realistic weaponry (Common to current weaponry, just more grungy looking weapons) and maybe a helmet. I mean there's officer Vi so there could be renegade or Military Jinx. I mean there's nothing scarier than someone dressed as military who isn't actually military.

Pool Party Gnar: Same as regular Gnar except he throws Frisbees. I don't know about his ultimate, but he could just have water effects. I'm not good at ideas when it comes to fitting a giant Mammoth monster thing into a pool party outfit.

Pool Party Gragas. I'm not sure if this is already a thing, but he could just be wearing speedos and have like his whole body censored.

Dark Arts Morgana. I'm not sure it's ok to put pentagrams into the game, but Morgana is a very visually aesthetic Champion and I think there is a lot of potential for things like infernal/dark magic/light magic type designs or even Pool Party Morgana. She'd make a good Jellyfish.

Sweetheart Darius: Hits you with love and respect. Brings down the hammer on social injustices. Debuffs you with lovehearts that causes your heart to bleed for him.

Triple Darius/Darius Cena. Hits people with chairs. Not much more to it. Could make Draven in on it, but Primetime Draven and Darius Cena/Triple Darius could be a cool team with the new Wrestling Champion Skins.

Paradise Trundle: Looks less ugly because of some magical idea where he's not as Ugly.

Stories of the Past Zed: Shadow themed Skin that goes with a vengeful set for the Ionians like Irelia/Akali/Kennen. Basically a black/silver reflective skin design for Zed coupled with... Well I don't know. I just think thematic to character relationship skins could be an awesome addition as there's already sort of a few I think and a lot of the skins fit the Character but sets relative to Runeterran relations would be sick.

I had one more idea. I think it was: Statue of Teemo or Kangaroo Suit Teemo. Just so he looks like a little statue when he's standing still in the middle of the lane. Also his death animation can be him crumbling. R.I.P Teemo. R.I.P.

replies.body: They should just make Mecha reksai, she fits that theme so well
